description:
When you find the ideal running sock, don't mess with a good thing. These socks have breathable and wicking fabric to keep you cool and supported as you push through the kilometers.

  • Synthetic blend wicks moisture to keep feet cool and dry
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers precise support where you need it
  • Feel 360® technology includes an anti-microbial silver ion treatment to eliminate odor causing bacteria
  • Infiknit™ construction add durability to high-friction areas
name: Stance Ultra Tab Run Socks - Unisex
